item.title: How to run Zwift in full screen
item.description: Zwift runs by default in windowed mode, with ugly start menu at bottom and title bar. It’s not a big deal, just something irritating. It might be as silly as funny, but I wasn’t able to find a good answer Googling on how to actually achieve it Eventually, accidentaly I found it! So let me share. Find in top-right corner icon with your points and click it From menu, choose “My settings” In new window, choose “Sound & Display” tab There it is!
